articles.description: The Samsung Galaxy A34 5G's pricing has dropped from Rs.35,499 to Rs.28,999. This amazing offer is available on Flipkart. The Samsung Galaxy A34 5G is now available with an 18% discount on the e-commerce site, bringing the price down to Rs. Rs.28,999

articles.title: GoPro Hero 12 Black review: All about refinements - India Today
articles.description: The GoPro Hero 12 Black is easier to recommend over the Hero 11 Black, thanks to its simpler interface and longer battery backup. On the hardware side, there aren't any significant changes, which may disappoint some customers. Read on to find out more.
articles.content: GoPro's new Hero 12 Black doesn't break any moulds in terms of design and specifications. Compared to its predecessor, the Hero 11 Black, apart from a textured body and a few tweaks here and there, t… [+9053 chars]
